H0.text: Mean rainfall is what the student calculates when she divides the total rainfall, obtained by recording rainfall amounts for 28 days and summing them, by 28.

H1.text: Rainfall mode is the result the student obtains when she divides the total rainfall—calculated from 28 days of recorded rainfall amounts—by 28.

H2.text: Median rainfall is the result the student calculates when she divides the total rainfall by 28.

H3.text: Percentage of rainfall is the value obtained when the student divides the total rainfall recorded over 28 days by 28.
